Clashing Characteristics? One or the other!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Clashing Characteristics? One or the other!
By Kurasu Soratobu on Sunday, February 23, 2003 - 09:09 am:

The first time, it was my Tiger/Hare against my Octopee/Octopee. This time, it's a different Tiger/Hare against my Lesione/Lesione, and the same thing's happened. Also, Synre mentioned something about it in chat the other day, with a Phoenix/Phoenix that only had Ice Up. It seems that the elemental traits have oppositions. If you get one, the other is superceded. Either that, or one is more 'dominant' than the other. The pair that I know of for sure:

UpLtning and UpWater

The Phoenix makes me think that UpIce and UpFire are like this. Which would leave UpEarth and UpWind. Reasonable. Opposing elements and all.

Any others that people have found? Non-elemental ones? Or is it just the elementals?

By GoldenBoy on Sunday, February 23, 2003 - 09:13 am:

I'm confused, are we talking about combining, or gaining them in training?

By Kurasu Soratobu on Sunday, February 23, 2003 - 09:28 am:

Both. As well as anything pulled from a password. If the monster's password would give it UpIce, and it's supposed to have UpFire, then UpIce will take UpFire's place. Like in the phoenix in our password list: DOA2. I've never been able to have UpWater and UpLtning on the same monster, no matter how the UpWater was gained.

Also, I think I've added another to the list.

UpMagic and UpMind

A joker I tried to create with the mask had UpMind (from one of the parents) rather than UpMagic (as a basic joker has).
